channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - s390x

item.title: Talk about SELinux on GSE Linux/Security
item.description: On today's GSE Linux / GSE Security meeting (in cooperation with IMUG) I gave a small (30 minutes) presentation about what SELinux is. The slides are online and cover two aspects of SELinux: some of its design principles, and then a set of features provided by SELinux. The talk is directed â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
